Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its actual worth, I propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, reflecting both the value we place on your patronage and the exceptional quality of our product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
